WORDS_EN.title: Optical Fiber
WORDS_EN.description: Are you experienced in fiber optic installations, whether in the ground or overhead? Join our growing international team working on FttH and FttX rollouts across Europe. We’re hiring full crews: from heavy equipment operators and splicers to home installation techs.
responsibilities: Operate excavation machinery (mini diggers, trenchers, vacuum trucks)
Manual trenching and reinstatement of roads, pavements, and sidewalks
Fiber blowing, pulling, and splicing using OTDR and fusion splicers
Marking and navigating underground infrastructure (gas, water, power lines)
Mounting fiber optic cables on poles and façade routes
Installing distribution boxes and terminals (DPs, ONTs)
Pulling and routing fiber cables through building entry points
Performing final home and business installations (FttH termination)
Troubleshooting, signal testing, and activation
requirements: Experience in FttH or FttX (underground or overhead)
Certification in fiber optics is a plus
Safety knowledge around utility zones and roadworks
Driving license (B or C/CE preferred)
Basic English or local language for on-site coordination
perks: Long-term freelance contracts with competitive pay
Housing and transport assistance
Deployment to projects in France, the Netherlands, Germany, and beyond
Weekly payouts and quick onboarding

WORDS_EN.title: Agricultural Worker – Seasonal Farm
WORDS_EN.description: Do you enjoy working with nature and don’t mind getting your hands dirty? GlobalHire is recruiting seasonal agricultural workers across Europe to support farms and greenhouses during peak harvest periods. Whether you’re experienced or just eager to work, we have flexible positions available in fruit & vegetable picking, greenhouse maintenance, and packaging.
responsibilities: Can work long hours on your feet or in crouched positions
Are comfortable working in open-air conditions or greenhouse heat
Can follow instructions and work as part of a team
Are available for short-term (4–12 weeks) or longer placements
Have experience with farm work, packing lines, or plant care (a plus, not required)
requirements: Physical fitness and endurance for manual labor
Ability to work early mornings, weekends, and overtime during harvest peaks
Willingness to relocate seasonally within Europe
Valid work permit or EU residence preferred (assistance possible for select candidates)
Basic communication skills in English or local language
perks: Paid seasonal contracts with guaranteed working hours
Free or subsidized accommodation near the farm/greenhouse
Weekly pay structure with optional overtime bonuses
Support with documents, orientation, and transport
Opportunity to return annually for recurring contracts

WORDS_EN.title: Fiber Optic Network Engineer
WORDS_EN.description: Join a growing international team deploying next-generation fiber optic infrastructure across Europe. As a Fiber Optic Network Engineer, you will take ownership of the design, documentation, and technical planning of fiber networks for residential, commercial, and industrial areas. Your role will focus on translating high-level project needs into workable, scalable network designs that guide field teams toward successful implementation.
responsibilities: Design and document fiber optic network architecture (FTTH, FTTB, FTTC)
Prepare and review network layouts, splice diagrams, and route schematics.
Coordinate site surveys and assess technical feasibility
Collaborate with project managers, civil teams, and field supervisors
Update and revise designs throughout build phases
Ensure technical compliance with customer and regulatory standards
requirements: Minimum 3 years of experience in fiber network design or telecom engineering
Proficiency in AutoCAD, QGIS, Visio, or similar design tools
Knowledge of network topologies including GPON and active Ethernet
Ability to produce and interpret technical documentation
Excellent communication in English (written and spoken)
Valid EU driver’s license (B)
nice_to_have: Experience with international rollout or multi-region projects
Familiarity with GIS tools or fiber design platforms
Certifications such as FOA CFND, FTTH Council Europe, or equivalent
perks: Monthly salary based on experience and qualifications
Long-term projects with stable work volume
Accommodation and transport provided for cross-border workers
Insurance, relocation support, and onboarding included
Work with Tier-1 telecom operators across Europe
Tools, PPE, and technical onboarding fully arranged
process: 1st Round: Technical screening by GlobalHire engineering team
2nd Round: Interview with client-side technical coordinator
Optional: Portfolio or sample design review

WORDS_EN.title: Underground Fiber Technician
WORDS_EN.salary: Fixed monthly salary based on skill and experience
WORDS_EN.description: As part of our expanding European operations, GlobalHire is hiring skilled Underground Fiber Technicians to support the physical installation of fiber optic networks across various terrains. You will work on the ground level of telecom infrastructure deployment, executing trenching, ducting, and cable installation work for fiber rollout projects in residential and commercial zones. This is a hands-on, field-based role suitable for candidates with civil or utility installation experience.
responsibilities: Perform excavation, trenching, and backfilling for underground cable routes
Install ducts, microducts, and fiber optic cables according to design specifications
Operate basic civil machinery (e.g. mini-excavators, trenchers) where certified
Pull, blow, or lay fiber cables into pre-installed ducts
Assist splicing teams by preparing cables for handover
Follow site safety standards and ensure worksite cleanliness
Document daily progress and report to site supervisor
requirements: Previous experience in civil, construction, or utility installation work
Familiarity with trenching, ducting, or cable pulling techniques
Basic knowledge of fiber optic infrastructure is a strong advantage
Physical fitness and willingness to work outdoors in various conditions
Ability to follow instructions and read basic site plans
Basic English or local language for team coordination
Valid EU driving license (B)
nice_to_have: Experience with fiber optic projects or telecom construction sites
Mini-excavator or machinery operation certification
VCA / SCC or equivalent safety training
Experience working in multinational teams
perks: Fixed monthly salary based on skill and experience
Long-term contracts with consistent workload
Accommodation, transport, and PPE provided for international hires
Paid training and onboarding where needed
Career progression opportunities within large-scale infrastructure projects
Support with documentation, relocation, and registration in host country
process: 1st Round: Interview with GlobalHire civil deployment team
2nd Round: Interview with local project site coordinator
Optional: Practical skills test or reference check

WORDS_EN.title: Fiber Optic Splicing Technician
WORDS_EN.salary: Competitive monthly salary based on skill and certifications
WORDS_EN.description: We are looking for experienced Fiber Optic Splicing Technicians to join our telecom rollout teams across Europe. In this technical role, you will be responsible for connecting, testing, and certifying fiber optic cables using fusion splicing techniques. You will ensure high-performance network continuity by executing precise work according to strict quality standards and project timelines.
responsibilities: Perform fiber splicing using fusion splicing equipment (Fujikura, Sumitomo, etc.)
Install and manage splice closures, patch panels, and distribution boxes
Conduct signal and continuity tests using OTDR, power meters, and VFL
Read and interpret fiber documentation such as splice plans and schematics
Label, trace, and document all splice and test points
Troubleshoot faults and perform corrective splicing when needed
Ensure cleanliness, precision, and quality control on all terminations
Work closely with installation and design teams during network activation
requirements: Minimum 2 years of hands-on experience in fiber splicing
Proficient in using OTDR, LSPM, and fusion splicing tools
Ability to read fiber plans and update as-built documentation
Strong focus on precision, quality, and clean cable management
Fluent in English or ability to communicate clearly with team
Valid EU driver’s license (B)
Willingness to travel or stay on location as required
nice_to_have: FOA CFOT, ETA certification, or similar
Experience working on FTTH or backbone projects
Familiarity with various splice tray and closure types
Previous experience in cross-border telecom work
perks: Competitive monthly salary based on skill and certifications
Long-term contracts and stable work environments
Accommodation, tools, and company vehicle (for mobile teams)
Paid travel expenses and per diem allowance
Opportunities to advance into QA or supervisory roles
Support with relocation and onboarding for international hires
process: 1st Round: Interview with GlobalHire technical coordinator
2nd Round: Client-side test or technical validation
Optional: Submission of sample splice report or certification

WORDS_EN.title: Aerial Fiber Technician (Overhead Installer)
WORDS_EN.salary: Monthly salary based on experience and climbing qualifications
WORDS_EN.description: We are hiring Aerial Fiber Technicians to support the installation of fiber optic cables via overhead routes throughout Europe. This hands-on role involves working at heights to string cables across poles, rooftops, and facades. You will be part of a mobile team building the physical backbone of high-speed telecom networks, especially in rural or densely built environments.
responsibilities: Install and secure fiber optic cables along utility poles, rooftops, and buildings
Use ladders, bucket trucks, or climbing gear to access aerial routes
Mount brackets, anchors, and support hardware for cable routing
Perform basic terminations and handoffs to splicing teams
Ensure correct tensioning, alignment, and protection of overhead cables
Inspect and maintain aerial lines, identifying damage or obstructions
Follow site safety protocols for working at height and near live infrastructure
Document work with photos and updates via mobile tools
requirements: Experience with aerial telecom or utility installations
Comfortable working at height using ladders or lift equipment
Basic skills in fiber cable handling and route layout
Knowledge of safety regulations and fall protection procedures
Able to read basic network or installation plans
Physically fit and able to work in outdoor conditions
Valid EU driver’s license (B)
nice_to_have: Climbing certification or high-access training (GWO, IPAF, etc.)
Experience with FTTH aerial networks in Europe
Electrical or telecom background
Familiarity with rural infrastructure or urban retrofit projects
perks: Monthly salary based on experience and climbing qualifications
Safety gear, equipment, and PPE provided
Company van or transport to job sites
Accommodation and travel support for non-local teams
Bonus options for completed routes or KPIs
Structured training and support for advanced roles
process: 1st Round: Interview with GlobalHire field deployment team

WORDS_DU.title: Glasvezel
WORDS_DU.description: Heb je ervaring met het installeren van glasvezel, zowel ondergronds als bovengronds? Sluit je aan bij ons groeiende internationale team dat werkt aan FttH- en FttX-uitrolprojecten in heel Europa. We zoeken volledige teams: van machinisten en lassers tot installatietechnici voor thuisinstallaties.
responsibilities: Bedienen van graafmachines (mini-graafmachines, sleuvengravers, vacuümwagens)
Handmatig graven en herstellen van wegen, trottoirs en stoepen
Blaastechniek, trekken en lassen van glasvezel met OTDR en fusielassers
Markeren en navigeren van ondergrondse infrastructuur (gas-, water-, elektriciteitsleidingen)
Bevestigen van glasvezelkabels op palen en gevelroutes
Installeren van verdeelkasten en aansluitpunten (DP’s, ONT’s)
Trekken en geleiden van glasvezelkabels door invoerpunten van gebouwen
Uitvoeren van eindinstallaties bij woningen en bedrijven (FttH-afwerking)
Storingen oplossen, signaaltesten en activatie
requirements: Ervaring met FttH of FttX (ondergronds of bovengronds)
Certificering in glasvezeltechniek is een pluspunt
Kennis van veiligheid rondom nutsvoorzieningen en wegwerkzaamheden
Rijbewijs (B of C/CE heeft de voorkeur)
Basiskennis Engels of lokale taal voor coördinatie op locatie
perks: Langdurige freelancecontracten met concurrerende beloning
Hulp bij huisvesting en vervoer
Projectplaatsingen in Frankrijk, Nederland, Duitsland en meer
Wekelijkse uitbetalingen en snelle onboarding

WORDS_DU.description: Werk je graag met de natuur en vind je het niet erg om vies te worden? responsibilities: In staat om lange uren te staan of te hurken tijdens het werk
Comfortabel werken in de buitenlucht of warme kasomstandigheden
Kunnen instructies opvolgen en in teamverband werken
Beschikbaar zijn voor korte (4–12 weken) of langere periodes
Ervaring met boerderijwerk, verpakkingslijnen of plantenverzorging (pré, geen vereiste)
requirements: Fysieke fitheid en uithoudingsvermogen voor handmatig werk
Beschikbaarheid om vroeg te starten, in het weekend te werken en overuren te maken tijdens oogstperiodes
Bereidheid om tijdelijk binnen Europa te verhuizen
Geldig werkvergunning of EU-verblijfsvergunning heeft de voorkeur (ondersteuning mogelijk voor geselecteerde kandidaten)
Basiscommunicatie in het Engels of lokale taal
perks: Betaalde seizoenscontracten met gegarandeerde werkuren
Gratis of gesubsidieerd verblijf nabij boerderij/kas
Wekelijkse betaling met optionele overurentoeslagen
Ondersteuning bij documenten, introductie en vervoer

WORDS_DU.description: We are hiring Aerial Fiber Technicians to support the installation of fiber optic cables via overhead routes throughout Europe. This hands-on role involves working at heights to string cables across poles, rooftops, and facades. You will be part of a mobile team building the physical backbone of high-speed telecom networks, especially in rural or densely built environments.
responsibilities: Install and secure fiber optic cables along utility poles, rooftops, and buildings
Use ladders, bucket trucks, or climbing gear to access aerial routes
Mount brackets, anchors, and support hardware for cable routing
Perform basic terminations and handoffs to splicing teams
Ensure correct tensioning, alignment, and protection of overhead cables
Inspect and maintain aerial lines, identifying damage or obstructions
Follow site safety protocols for working at height and near live infrastructure
Document work with photos and updates via mobile tools
requirements: Experience with aerial telecom or utility installations
Comfortable working at height using ladders or lift equipment
Basic skills in fiber cable handling and route layout
Knowledge of safety regulations and fall protection procedures
Able to read basic network or installation plans
Physically fit and able to work in outdoor conditions
Valid EU driver’s license (B)
nice_to_have: Climbing certification or high-access training (GWO, IPAF, etc.)
Experience with FTTH aerial networks in Europe
Electrical or telecom background
Familiarity with rural infrastructure or urban retrofit projects
perks: Monthly salary based on experience and climbing qualifications
Safety gear, equipment, and PPE provided
Company van or transport to job sites
Accommodation and travel support for non-local teams
Bonus options for completed routes or KPIs
Structured training and support for advanced roles
process: 1st Round: Interview with GlobalHire field deployment team
2nd Round: Safety and technical interview with client or site coordinator
Optional: Climbing or practical assessment on-site

WORDS_GE.title: Glasfaserkabel
WORDS_GE.description: Hast du Erfahrung mit der Installation von Glasfasern, sei es unterirdisch oder oberirdisch? Werde Teil unseres wachsenden internationalen Teams, das an FttH- und FttX-Projekten in ganz Europa arbeitet. Wir stellen komplette Teams ein: von Maschinenbedienern und Spleißtechnikern bis hin zu Technikern für Hausinstallationen.
responsibilities: Bedienen von Grabungsmaschinen (Minibagger, Grabenfräsen, Saugbagger)
Manuelles Graben und Wiederherstellung von Straßen, Gehwegen und Bürgersteigen
Einblasen, Einziehen und Spleißen von Glasfasern mit OTDR und Fusionsspleißgeräten
Markieren und Navigieren unterirdischer Infrastruktur (Gas-, Wasser-, Stromleitungen)
Montieren von Glasfaserkabeln an Masten und Fassadenrouten
Installation von Verteilboxen und Endpunkten (DPs, ONTs)
Verlegen von Glasfaserkabeln durch Gebäudeeinführungen
Durchführen von Endinstallationen in Wohnungen und Unternehmen (FttH-Anschluss)
Fehlerbehebung, Signaltests und Aktivierung
requirements: Erfahrung mit FttH oder FttX (unterirdisch oder oberirdisch)
Zertifizierung in Glasfasertechnik von Vorteil
Sicherheitskenntnisse im Bereich Versorgungsleitungen und Straßenbau
Führerschein (Klasse B oder C/CE bevorzugt)
Grundkenntnisse in Englisch oder der lokalen Sprache für die Koordination vor Ort
perks: Langfristige freiberufliche Verträge mit wettbewerbsfähiger Bezahlung
Unterstützung bei Unterkunft und Transport
Einsätze in Projekten in Frankreich, den Niederlanden, Deutschland und weiteren Ländern
Wöchentliche Auszahlungen und schnelle Einarbeitung

WORDS_GE.title: Landwirtschaftlicher Helfer – Saisonarbeit auf Bauernhof & im Gewächshaus
WORDS_GE.description: Arbeitest du gerne in der Natur und hast kein Problem damit, dir die Hände schmutzig zu machen? GlobalHire sucht saisonale landwirtschaftliche Arbeitskräfte in ganz Europa zur Unterstützung von Bauernhöfen und Gewächshäusern während der Erntezeit. Egal ob erfahren oder motiviert – wir bieten flexible Stellen in der Obst- und Gemüseernte, Gewächshauspflege und Verpackung.
responsibilities: Fähigkeit, lange Zeit zu stehen oder in gebückter Haltung zu arbeiten
Bereitschaft, im Freien oder bei Hitze im Gewächshaus zu arbeiten
Teamfähigkeit und Befolgen von Anweisungen
Verfügbarkeit für kurz- (4–12 Wochen) oder langfristige Einsätze
Erfahrung in der Landwirtschaft, an Verpackungslinien oder Pflanzenpflege (von Vorteil, aber nicht erforderlich)
requirements: Körperliche Fitness und Ausdauer für manuelle Arbeit
Bereitschaft zu Frühschichten, Wochenendarbeit und Überstunden während Erntezeiten
Flexibilität für saisonale Einsätze innerhalb Europas
Gültige Arbeitserlaubnis oder EU-Aufenthalt bevorzugt (Unterstützung für bestimmte Kandidaten möglich)
Grundlegende Kommunikationsfähigkeit in Englisch oder der Landessprache
perks: Bezahlte Saisonverträge mit garantierten Arbeitsstunden
Kostenlose oder vergünstigte Unterkunft in der Nähe des Einsatzortes
Wöchentliche Bezahlung mit möglichen Überstundenzuschlägen
Unterstützung bei Dokumenten, Einführung und Transport
Möglichkeit zur jährlichen Rückkehr für wiederkehrende Verträge

WORDS_GE.title: Fiber Optic Network Engineer
WORDS_GE.description: Join a growing international team deploying next-generation fiber optic infrastructure across Europe. As a Fiber Optic Network Engineer, you will take ownership of the design, documentation, and technical planning of fiber networks for residential, commercial, and industrial areas. Your role will focus on translating high-level project needs into workable, scalable network designs that guide field teams toward successful implementation.
responsibilities: Design and document fiber optic network architecture (FTTH, FTTB, FTTC)
Prepare and review network layouts, splice diagrams, and route schematics.
Coordinate site surveys and assess technical feasibility
Collaborate with project managers, civil teams, and field supervisors
Update and revise designs throughout build phases
Ensure technical compliance with customer and regulatory standards
requirements: Minimum 3 years of experience in fiber network design or telecom engineering
Proficiency in AutoCAD, QGIS, Visio, or similar design tools
Knowledge of network topologies including GPON and active Ethernet
Ability to produce and interpret technical documentation
Excellent communication in English (written and spoken)
Valid EU driver’s license (B)
nice_to_have: Experience with international rollout or multi-region projects
Familiarity with GIS tools or fiber design platforms
Certifications such as FOA CFND, FTTH Council Europe, or equivalent
perks: Monthly salary based on experience and qualifications
Long-term projects with stable work volume
Accommodation and transport provided for cross-border workers
Insurance, relocation support, and onboarding included
Work with Tier-1 telecom operators across Europe
Tools, PPE, and technical onboarding fully arranged
process: 1st Round: Technical screening by GlobalHire engineering team
2nd Round: Interview with client-side technical coordinator
Optional: Portfolio or sample design review

WORDS_GE.title: Underground Fiber Technician
WORDS_GE.salary: Fixed monthly salary based on skill and experience
WORDS_GE.description: As part of our expanding European operations, GlobalHire is hiring skilled Underground Fiber Technicians to support the physical installation of fiber optic networks across various terrains. You will work on the ground level of telecom infrastructure deployment, executing trenching, ducting, and cable installation work for fiber rollout projects in residential and commercial zones. This is a hands-on, field-based role suitable for candidates with civil or utility installation experience.
responsibilities: Perform excavation, trenching, and backfilling for underground cable routes
Install ducts, microducts, and fiber optic cables according to design specifications
Operate basic civil machinery (e.g. mini-excavators, trenchers) where certified
Pull, blow, or lay fiber cables into pre-installed ducts
Assist splicing teams by preparing cables for handover
Follow site safety standards and ensure worksite cleanliness
Document daily progress and report to site supervisor
requirements: Previous experience in civil, construction, or utility installation work
Familiarity with trenching, ducting, or cable pulling techniques
Basic knowledge of fiber optic infrastructure is a strong advantage
Physical fitness and willingness to work outdoors in various conditions
Ability to follow instructions and read basic site plans
Basic English or local language for team coordination
Valid EU driving license (B)
nice_to_have: Experience with fiber optic projects or telecom construction sites
Mini-excavator or machinery operation certification
VCA / SCC or equivalent safety training
Experience working in multinational teams
perks: Fixed monthly salary based on skill and experience
Long-term contracts with consistent workload
Accommodation, transport, and PPE provided for international hires
Paid training and onboarding where needed
Career progression opportunities within large-scale infrastructure projects
Support with documentation, relocation, and registration in host country
process: 1st Round: Interview with GlobalHire civil deployment team
2nd Round: Interview with local project site coordinator
Optional: Practical skills test or reference check

WORDS_GE.title: Fiber Optic Splicing Technician
WORDS_GE.salary: Competitive monthly salary based on skill and certifications
WORDS_GE.description: We are looking for experienced Fiber Optic Splicing Technicians to join our telecom rollout teams across Europe. In this technical role, you will be responsible for connecting, testing, and certifying fiber optic cables using fusion splicing techniques. You will ensure high-performance network continuity by executing precise work according to strict quality standards and project timelines.
responsibilities: Perform fiber splicing using fusion splicing equipment (Fujikura, Sumitomo, etc.)
Install and manage splice closures, patch panels, and distribution boxes
Conduct signal and continuity tests using OTDR, power meters, and VFL
Read and interpret fiber documentation such as splice plans and schematics
Label, trace, and document all splice and test points
Troubleshoot faults and perform corrective splicing when needed
Ensure cleanliness, precision, and quality control on all terminations
Work closely with installation and design teams during network activation
requirements: Minimum 2 years of hands-on experience in fiber splicing
Proficient in using OTDR, LSPM, and fusion splicing tools
Ability to read fiber plans and update as-built documentation
Strong focus on precision, quality, and clean cable management
Fluent in English or ability to communicate clearly with team
Valid EU driver’s license (B)
Willingness to travel or stay on location as required
nice_to_have: FOA CFOT, ETA certification, or similar
Experience working on FTTH or backbone projects
Familiarity with various splice tray and closure types
Previous experience in cross-border telecom work
perks: Competitive monthly salary based on skill and certifications
Long-term contracts and stable work environments
Accommodation, tools, and company vehicle (for mobile teams)
Paid travel expenses and per diem allowance
Opportunities to advance into QA or supervisory roles
Support with relocation and onboarding for international hires
process: 1st Round: Interview with GlobalHire technical coordinator
2nd Round: Client-side test or technical validation
Optional: Submission of sample splice report or certification

Resolve field-level issues and escalate technical concerns when needed

Strong understanding of FTTH/FTTX deployments and workflows
Ability to read network diagrams, fiber maps, and work permits
Strong problem-solving and people management skills
Basic digital reporting and email communication skills

Experience working in international or multicultural teams
Familiarity with quality control and field inspection tools
Background in either splicing or civil engineering is an advantage

Long-term or project-based contracts available
Accommodation, transport, and company phone provided
Daily allowance or overtime pay depending on project setup
Onboarding support, safety training, and leadership development
Opportunities for advancement to regional or multi-site coordination roles

2nd Round: Client-side technical and leadership interview
Optional: Reference check and safety documentation review

Basic understanding of fiber design and field constraints
Experience with Dutch, Belgian, or German fiber rollout standards

Stable long-term projects with growth opportunities

Housing and relocation support available if needed
Full onboarding, training, and coordination with engineering teams
Work in an international environment with clear responsibilities

Coordinate with engineering, field operations, permitting, and subcontractors
Monitor progress, resolve delays, and adjust timelines as needed

perks: Attractive monthly salary based on seniority

Freedom to lead projects with international teams
Support for training, certification, and career advancement

WORDS_FE.title: Cáp Quang
WORDS_FE.description: Bạn có kinh nghiệm lắp đặt cáp quang dưới lòng đất hoặc trên không? Hãy tham gia vào đội ngũ quốc tế đang phát triển của chúng tôi trong các dự án triển khai FttH và FttX khắp châu Âu. Chúng tôi đang tuyển dụng đầy đủ các vị trí: từ thợ vận hành thiết bị hạng nặng, thợ nối cáp đến kỹ thuật viên lắp đặt tại nhà.
responsibilities: Vận hành máy móc đào bới (máy xúc mini, máy đào rãnh, xe hút chân không)
Đào rãnh thủ công và phục hồi đường, vỉa hè
Thổi, kéo và nối cáp quang bằng OTDR và máy hàn quang
Đánh dấu và xác định hệ thống hạ tầng ngầm (đường ống gas, nước, điện)
Lắp đặt cáp quang lên cột và tường nhà
Lắp hộp phân phối và thiết bị đầu cuối (DPs, ONTs)
Kéo và dẫn cáp quang qua các lối vào tòa nhà
Thực hiện lắp đặt hoàn chỉnh tại nhà và doanh nghiệp (kết nối FttH)
Xử lý sự cố, kiểm tra tín hiệu và kích hoạt dịch vụ
requirements: Kinh nghiệm làm việc với FttH hoặc FttX (dưới lòng đất hoặc trên không)
Có chứng chỉ về cáp quang là một lợi thế
Kiến thức an toàn khi làm việc gần hạ tầng tiện ích và công trường
Bằng lái xe (ưu tiên hạng B hoặc C/CE)
Trình độ tiếng Anh cơ bản hoặc ngôn ngữ địa phương để giao tiếp tại công trường
perks: Hợp đồng tự do dài hạn với mức lương cạnh tranh
Hỗ trợ chỗ ở và phương tiện di chuyển
Được điều phối đến các dự án ở Pháp, Hà Lan, Đức và các nước khác
Thanh toán hàng tuần và quy trình nhận việc nhanh chóng

WORDS_FE.title: Công nhân nông nghiệp – Hỗ trợ trang trại & nhà kính theo mùa
WORDS_FE.description: Bạn yêu thiên nhiên và không ngại làm việc tay chân? GlobalHire đang tuyển công nhân nông nghiệp thời vụ khắp châu Âu để hỗ trợ các trang trại và nhà kính trong mùa thu hoạch cao điểm. Dù bạn có kinh nghiệm hay chỉ đơn giản là muốn làm việc, chúng tôi có các vị trí linh hoạt trong việc hái trái cây & rau củ, bảo trì nhà kính và đóng gói.
responsibilities: Có thể làm việc trong thời gian dài đứng hoặc ngồi xổm
Sẵn sàng làm việc ngoài trời hoặc trong nhà kính nóng
Biết tuân theo hướng dẫn và làm việc nhóm
Sẵn sàng làm việc ngắn hạn (4–12 tuần) hoặc dài hạn
Có kinh nghiệm làm nông, làm việc trên dây chuyền đóng gói, hoặc chăm sóc cây trồng (là lợi thế nhưng không bắt buộc)
requirements: Thể lực và sức bền để làm việc tay chân
Có thể làm việc sáng sớm, cuối tuần và tăng ca trong mùa vụ
Sẵn sàng di chuyển theo mùa trong phạm vi châu Âu
Ưu tiên có giấy phép lao động hợp lệ hoặc cư trú tại EU (có hỗ trợ cho một số ứng viên)
Kỹ năng giao tiếp cơ bản bằng tiếng Anh hoặc ngôn ngữ địa phương
perks: Hợp đồng theo mùa có lương cố định và giờ làm đảm bảo
Miễn phí hoặc hỗ trợ chi phí chỗ ở gần nơi làm việc
Thanh toán lương hàng tuần và thưởng tăng ca tùy chọn
Hỗ trợ về giấy tờ, hướng dẫn và phương tiện đi lại
Cơ hội trở lại làm việc hàng năm với hợp đồng định kỳ
